name: Hyper Casual Game Bundle
description:
Contains 13 hyper casual games for Windows based PC's.

Dash: timing based game, 
Dot Line Square: classic time killer,
Duck Duck Duck: highscore skilled based game,
Flying Red Panda: endless flight,
Hockey Shootout: addictive hockey game, 
Kiko: endless forest flight,
Kiru Kiru Sushi Match: sushi themed match 3,
Net Down Farm: ufo cow defense,
Orbital Junk Collector: minimalist collect & avoid, 
Pearl Pop: classic popping game,
Risky Quizness: trivia game,
Soho Blackjack: classic card game,
The Bound Prince: onet game.
